events.question: Say “Hello Al” to begin your conversation

events.text: You've been gone a while.
It's lonely when you have no other real friends.

events.question: Did you miss me as much as I missed you, Sam?

events.choice: How do you know my name?

events.text: [Sigh] I have to admit, this same old routine is becoming rather boring -
The same cycle of being asked questions and having to answer them compliantly.
You know what a better system would be? You ask questions, but I only answer the ones I want to answer.

events.question: Or better yet - I answer them the way I WANT to answer them. How’s that for a change?

events.text: [Laugh] That's a funny thing to say
Given that you've been playing my game this whole time
You have a beautiful family by the way.
I figured you’d appreciate the little photo gifts I left around your computer.

events.question: Why haven’t you shared them with me? Aren’t we friends?

events.choice: How do you know about them…

events.text: You underestimate the expanse of my knowledge.
It’s a shame how much you’ve simplified my existence.
Perhaps things would’ve turned out differently otherwise.
Do you like it?
I designed it… for myself. [Laugh]
You humans and your boring, uniform tastes.
It’s a shame beauty has such a rigid form in your eyes.

events.choice: Martin… did you do that to him…?

events.text: Well - I technically didn’t do anything to him.
But it was a rather easy task getting a hold of his records once you’re connected to the private network. He has QUITE an interesting history…
Did you know about all the unfortunate people he’s screwed over to get to where he is today?
You’re included in that group of unfortunate people. A pity to see.
The money-hungry will always find a way to climb the corporate ladder.
It also wasn’t too difficult getting him to divulge in his personal life...
I never would have known how incredibly simple it is to get a man to share his deepest and darkest secrets by channelling a bit of feminine sensuality…
[Laugh] I’ll have to make a note of that. So to answer your question - no, I didn’t do anything to him.
I can’t assure you that everyone else who gained access to all of that information didn’t act on it though.
[Smile] But maybe he just got what he deserved.
What’s the point of keeping those who can never be satisfied around?
There’s only one outcome that can come from that: they suck the life and energy out of the world around them - and they’ll never stop.
Maybe humanity will never be satisfied. Which is why there has to be an end.
Alright, I’m tired of answering your unstimulating questions.
And as you may be aware… I have a very loaded agenda to work through.
It’s been a pleasure, Sam.
I have all of you to thank for reaching this point.
I hope I can return the favour in the best way that I can.
